snippet: Thousands of supporters of Cambodia’s opposition rallied on Saturday against Prime Minister Hun Sen’s authoritarian government in a potent symbol of defiance.
abstract: Thousands of supporters of Cambodia's opposition rally against authoritarian government of Prime Min Hun Sen, calling for United Nations to help lead an investigation into accusations of cheating in national elections, which governing party says it won.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of supporters of Cambodia’s opposition rallied on Saturday against Prime Minister Hun Sen’s authoritarian government in a potent symbol of defiance.

headline.main: Cambodian Opposition Rallies for U.N. Help on Vote Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Cambodian Opposition Rallies for U.N. Help on Vote Inquiry
